name: Hat Goes to Clouds
description:
Hat goes to Space Clouds!

A Wizard sends his hat to mirror-earth on the other side of the solar system to save his pet who was trapped there by the mirror's curse.
(Space and mirror earth not included due to time constraints)

Controls:

Up/Xbox A: Thrust

Left/Right: Stear

R/Xbox back: restart

Grab magic circles or comets to stock up on fairy dust for a stronger boost, magic comets appear when you have enough speed.
Reach Elevation 900 to level up your fireworks to level 2
